column2: We will release all our vasalls that are currently NOT in our sphere
Allow other nations to ask us for grants
Stop allowing other nations to ask us for grants
Asks all nations who are currently offering grants for financial aid. Check first if other nations are offering grants!
We reformed our Empire into a modern state.

Scince the foundation of the Austrian Empire not really much happend internal, exept some small attemts in the napoleonic age to reform the bureaucratic system. Our administrative is today incapable to keep our great country in order, we have to reform it into a truely modern state.
Our people rejoice: At long last we stand united!
We are at war and so the tired, poor and huddled masses don't longer put their hopes in us.
